description.en: Increases Max HP by +150 for 1 hour. Once expired it becomes a Love Sprout.
description.ar: Increases Max HP by +150 for 1 hour. Once expired it becomes a Love Sprout.
description.br: Aumenta a vida máxima (HP) em 150 por 1 hora. Uma vez expirado, se torna um Broto do Amor.
description.cns: 1小时内最大HP增加150点。 一旦过期，它就变成了一个爱的萌芽。
description.de: Erhöht deine HP um +150 für eine Stunde. Sobald es abgelaufen ist, verwandelt es sich in einen Love Sprout.
description.fi: Increases Max HP by +150 for 1 hour. Once expired it becomes a Love Sprout.
description.fil: Increases Max HP by +150 for 1 hour. Once expired it becomes a Love Sprout.
description.fr: PV max +150 (1h). Se transforme ensuite en Plante dédoublée.
description.id: Meningkatkan Max HP sebesar +150 selama 1 jam. Setelah kedaluwarsa itu menjadi Love Sprout.
description.it: Increases Max HP by +150 for 1 hour. Once expired it becomes a Love Sprout.
description.jp: 1時間、最大HPが+150増加します。効果が切れると、新芽の植木鉢になります。
description.kr: 1시간 동안 최대 체력이 +150 증가합니다. 유통기한이 끝나면 새싹의 화분이 됩니다.
description.nl: Increases Max HP by +150 for 1 hour. Once expired it becomes a Love Sprout.
description.pl: Increases Max HP by +150 for 1 hour. Once expired it becomes a Love Sprout.
description.ru: Increases Max HP by +150 for 1 hour. Once expired it becomes a Love Sprout.
description.sp: Aumenta la Máx. HP en +150 durante 1 hora. Cuando expira, se convierte en un Brote de Amor.
description.sw: Increases Max HP by +150 for 1 hour. Once expired it becomes a Love Sprout.
description.th: เพิ่ม Max HP ขึ้น +150 เป็นเวลา 1 ชั่วโมง เมื่อหมดอายุจะกลายเป็น Love Sprout
description.tw: 最大上限HP+150，持續1小時，時間一到將會變成萌芽的愛
description.vi: Tăng Máu tối đa thêm 150 trong 1 giờ. Sau khi hết hạn nó sẽ trở thành Mầm Love Sprout.
